meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of the <radical>yakuza</radical> shows you his <radical>knife</radical>. He says, "This is an <kanji>example</kanji> of a knife."
readingMnemonic: "This is an <kanji>example</kanji>," the leader of the yakuza tells you. "Next time, I'll show you an example of a <reading>ray</reading> (れい) gun."
